text: Avdeyevo () is a rural locality (a village) and the administrative center of Avdeyevskoye Rural Settlement of Pudozhsky District, Republic of Karelia, Russia. The population was 361 as of 2013.Численность населения в разрезе сельских населённых пунктов Республики Карелия по состоянию на 1 января 2013 года == Geography == The village is located 34 km north-west from Pudozh. == References == Category:Rural localities in the Republic of Karelia
title: Avdeyevo, Republic of Karelia
